Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldCustomizer
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagationCustomizer
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.RateForMethod
    since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.ProbabilityOfMethod
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    brave.propagation.B3SinglePropagation
    Since 5.9, use B3Propagation.newFactoryBuilder() to control inject formats.
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.Factory
    Since 5.11 use Propagation.Factory
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation.FactoryBuilder
    brave.propagation.SamplingFlags.Builder
    prefer using constants. This will be removed in Brave v6
    brave.sampler.ParameterizedSampler.Rule
    Since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.Builder.putRule(Matcher, Sampler)
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    brave.propagation.Propagation.B3_SINGLE_STRING
    Since 5.9, use B3Propagation.newFactoryBuilder() to control inject formats.
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.current​(String)
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getByName(String) and BaggageField.getValue()
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.extraKeys()
    Since 5.11 do not use this, as it was only added for OpenTracing. brave-opentracing works around this.
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder.addField​(String)
    Since 5.11, use BaggagePropagationConfig.SingleBaggageField.remote(BaggageField)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder.addPrefixedFields​(String, Collection<String>)
    Since 5.11, use BaggagePropagationConfig.SingleBaggageField.Builder.addKeyName(String)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.FactoryBuilder.addRedactedField​(String)
    Since 5.11, use BaggagePropagationConfig.SingleBaggageField.local(BaggageField)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.get​(String)
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getByName(String) and BaggageField.getValue()
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.getAll()
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getAll()
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.newFactory​(Propagation.Factory, String...)
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation.newFactoryBuilder(Propagation.Factory)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.newFactoryBuilder​(Propagation.Factory)
    Since 5.11 use BaggagePropagation.newFactoryBuilder(Propagation.Factory)
    brave.propagation.ExtraFieldPropagation.set​(String, String)
    Since 5.11 use BaggageField.getByName(String) and BaggageField.updateValue(String)
    brave.propagation.TraceContextOrSamplingFlags.sampled​(Boolean)
    do not use object variant.. only set when you have a sampling decision
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.create​(DeclarativeSampler.RateForMethod<M>)
    since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.createWithProbability(ProbabilityOfMethod)
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.sample​(M)
    Since 5.8, use DeclarativeSampler.trySample(Object)
    brave.sampler.DeclarativeSampler.toSampler​(M)
    Since 5.8, use Tracer.startScopedSpan(String, SamplerFunction, Object)
    brave.sampler.ParameterizedSampler.create​(List<? extends ParameterizedSampler.Rule<P>>)
    since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.newBuilder()
    brave.sampler.ParameterizedSampler.sample​(P)
    Since 5.8, use ParameterizedSampler.trySample(Object)
    brave.Span.remoteEndpoint​(Endpoint)
    Use Span.remoteServiceName(String) Span.remoteIpAndPort(String, int). Will be removed in Brave v6.
    brave.Tracer.withSampler​(Sampler)
    Since 5.8, use Tracer.nextSpan(SamplerFunction, Object) or Tracer.startScopedSpan(String, SamplerFunction, Object)
    brave.Tracing.Builder.endpoint​(Endpoint)
    Use Tracing.Builder.localServiceName(String) Tracing.Builder.localIp(String) and Tracing.Builder.localPort(int). Will be removed in Brave v6.
